title: mskcc-microbiome/mskccdemux pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

primer_f.errorMessage: Forward Primer must be provided and cannot contain spaces

primer_r.errorMessage: Revers Primer must be provided and cannot contain spaces

barcode_f.errorMessage: Forward barcode must be provided and cannot contain spaces

barcode_r.errorMessage: Revers barcode must be provided and cannot contain spaces

fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
